t: What does Amazon certified mean? - Amazon.com: Customer ...
s: This printer is not listed as Amazon Certified. Perhaps you are referring to a designation when products are refurbished, and certified by Amazon to be up to manufacturer specs. Please contact Amazon customer service to inquire further.
